validation.errorMessage: There was an error validating the TWINT certificate (selected file and password). Please try again or use a different certification.

twint.certificateSuccess: Certificate is an valid TWINT certificate.
twint.certificatePasswordHelpText: The password for the certificate file is optional. If you have set a password for the certificate file, please enter it here.

errors.INVALID_ISSUER: Invalid Issuer; Only allow CH and TWINT AG
